lines.text: He's upstairs. You look like bad news, Miller.
Bad news came to town on the same train I did - only he was riding the caboose and I was riding the rods.
Looked like gunplay that time, Tim
I've crossed guns with Gordon before. He went to the penitentiary.
I suppose, Polly, now that you and Dick have the ranch back, that finishes everything.
[Tim has just shot Grindell's hired killer]
You came here looking for trouble, didn't you?
Well, I'm here and I'm looking at you, if that's what you mean.
I'm getting tired of your meddling. This town ain't big enough for the both of us and I'm going to give you 24 hours to get out. If I see you in Carabinas by this time tomorrow, it's you or me!
I'll see you at this time... tomorrow.
